 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָפַד‎</span>] **verb** ==spread== (Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***rapâdu***</u></abbr>, ***stretch oneself***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***prop up, support, aid, give***, compare **Pi\`el** below; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רפדת‎</span> plural ***protection, guard***, [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>iv, no. 40, 3</sup>, compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ארפד‎</span> ***terraces*** [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>Hofmus</sup>.); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְפַּד‎</span> [[Job.41.22|Job 41:22]] ***he*** (the crocodile) ***spreadeth a threshing-sledge upon the mud*** (leaves marks upon it from his scales). **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 1 south of couch (figurative) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִפַּדְתּי יְצוּעָ֑י‎</span> [[Job.17.13|Job 17:13]] then (***spread out*** any support, hence) ***Imperative*** masculine plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַפְּדוּנִי‎</span> [[Song.2.5|Song 2:5]] ***support me*** with apples (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַמְּכוּ‎</span>).
